varlistentry.term: Does Jeedom requires a subscription?

listitem.simpara: No, Jeedom does not require a subscription to use. Only an online backup service is optional surcharge.

varlistentry.term: Does Jeedom require external servers to operate?

listitem.simpara: Non, Jeedom n’utilise pas d’infrastructure type "Cloud". Tout se fait en local et vous n’avez pas besoin de nos serveurs pour que votre installation fonctionne. Seuls les services comme le Market, la sauvegarde online ou le DNS Jeedom nécessitent l’utilisation de nos serveurs.

varlistentry.term: Can the order of the controls of a device be changed?

listitem.simpara: Yes it is possible, simply drag & drop the controls of your device.

varlistentry.term: Can the style of the widgets be edited?

listitem.simpara: Yes it is possible either via the widget plugin, or using the page Main → Command setup → Advanced display

varlistentry.term: Peut-on mettre plusieurs fois le même équipement sur un design ?

listitem.simpara: No this is not possible, but you can duplicate it using the virtual Plugin.

varlistentry.term: How to change an erroneous data in the history?

listitem.simpara: On a historical chart, just click on the point in question to edit it. If you leave the fields blank then the value is deleted.

varlistentry.term: How to avoid to log in each time?

listitem.simpara: At login just check the box "Register this computer".

varlistentry.term: How long takes a backup?

listitem.simpara: There is no standard time, it depends on the system and the data volume, so it may take more than 5 minutes, which is normal.

varlistentry.term: Is there a native mobile app?

listitem.simpara: Jeedom has a version of the web application for mobile and tablet. A native mobile application is being developed by the team right now, but no release date has been announced yet. It is quite possible that third-party developers realized dedicated applications for Jeedom.

varlistentry.term: What are the credentials to use at login the first time?

listitem.simpara: When you first connect to Jeedom (and beyond if you don’t change it) the user name is admin and the default password is admin. At the first connection, it is strongly recommended to change these identifiers for better security.

varlistentry.term: Where to buy the Mini +?

listitem.simpara: Jeedom Mini is marketed at our partner http://www.domadoo.fr/.

varlistentry.term: Impossible to access Jeedom from to the outside after purchasing a box

listitem.simpara: By default Jeedom is running at the root of Nginx on a box. You do not have to add /jeedom/ in the access address. The exact address will be: your_public_ip:your_port/

varlistentry.term: J’ai le message : "Vous avez un trop grand nombre de systèmes Jeedom déclarés, veuillez en réduire le nombre et demander une réinitialisation de vos clefs d’installation", que faire ?

listitem.simpara: Rendez vous sur le Market, connectez-vous avec votre compte puis allez sur votre page profil et demandez une réinitilisation des clefs d’installation.

varlistentry.term: What is "event only " and "lifetime cache" ?

listitem.simpara: Event only: tells Jeedom to never request the value (it is the device / module that provides it). So when receiving a value, it is set as infinite lifetime (until reception of the next one).

Lifetime cache: how long a value is valid, if you put 60 seconds for example, when the value get older than 60 sec AND jeedom needs the value (dashboard, scenario …) then it will ask for the device / module to get an updated value.

article.simpara: Attention, ces 2 options sont réservées aux utilisateurs avancés qui comprennent parfaitement leur fonction, une erreur de configuration dans cette partie peut rendre une installation instable voire inopérante. Par exemple, en zwave, rfxcom et enocean, la case événement seulement devrait TOUJOURS être cochée.

varlistentry.term: Where are the Jeedom backups ?

listitem.simpara: They are in the folder /usr/share/nginx/www/jeedom/backup

varlistentry.term: How to update Jeedom from SSH?

listitem.simpara: En SSH faîtes :

article.programlisting: sudo su - php /usr/share/nginx/www/jeedom/install/install.php chmod -R 775 /usr/share/nginx/www/jeedom chown -R www-data:www-data /usr/share/nginx/www/jeedom

varlistentry.term: Is the Webapp compatible with Symbian ?

listitem.simpara: The webapp requires a smartphone that supports HTML5 and CSS3 . Therefore is unfortunately not compatible Symbian.

varlistentry.term: On what platforms Jeedom works ?

listitem.simpara: Pour que Jeedom fonctionne il faut une plateforme linux avec les droits root ou un système type docker. Il ne fonctionne donc pas sur une plateforme android pure.
